alert.note: Alert for Churchill (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 02 at 3:12PM PDT until September 02 at 3:45PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: The National Weather Service in Reno has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Churchill County in west central Nevada... * Until 345 PM PDT. * At 311 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles northwest of New Pass Summit, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, fencing and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Churchill County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
